resources.string: Control what data is temporarily stored during your session. These settings use Meta\'s Wearables Device Access Toolkit for camera and audio streaming. You can stop streaming at any time.
When enabled, raw audio from your glasses microphone is kept in memory for processing and debugging. Audio is never saved to disk and is cleared when you end the session.
When enabled, video frames from your glasses camera are kept in memory for multimodal queries. Frames are never saved to disk and are cleared when you end the session.
When enabled, text transcripts of your conversations are kept for session history. This helps provide context for follow-up questions. Transcripts are cleared when you end the session.
All data storage is in-memory only and automatically cleared when the session ends. No data is written to disk or transmitted outside your control.
